participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

WIAT_01.Description: 131-item subtest. Raw score is the sum of correct responses. Assesses early reading (letter identification and phonological awareness) and word recognition and decoding skills.

WIAT_02.Description: 54-item subtest. Raw score is the sum of correct responses. Assesses the ability to identify and write numbers, count using 1:1 correspondence, and solve written calculation problems and simple equations involving the basic operations of addition, subtraction, and multiplication, and division.

WIAT_03.Description: 53-item subtest. Raw score is the sum of correct responses. Assesses the ability to spell dictated letters, letter blends, and words.

WIAT_04.Description: Standard scores are derived from raw scores from Appendix C (age-based) in WIAT-II manual.

WIAT_05.Description: Standard scores are derived from raw scores from Appendix C (age-based) in WIAT-II manual.

WIAT_06.Description: Standard scores are derived from raw scores from Appendix C (age-based) in WIAT-II manual.

WIAT_07.Description: Sum of standard scores for word reading, numerical operations, and spelling subtests.

WIAT_08.Description: Standard scores are derived from raw scores from Appendix C (age-based) in WIAT-II manual.
